name: oneluckidevWebSmokeTest
description: Release Task to test the availability of a web application after the deployment step so you can determine if the release was successful or not
author: Jeff Przylucki

inputs.name: url
inputs.label: Url(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Url subject to the test. Addresses must begin with the appropriate protocol (http/https).  You may include multiple urls by providing a comma separated list. (ex. 'http://server1/api/healthcheck, http://server2/api/healthcheck')

inputs.name: retryAttemptCount
inputs.label: Number of Retry Attempts
inputs.helpMarkDown: Number of time to retry the call to the site before failing. A value of 0 will not retry.  Good values are ususally between 1 and 5.

inputs.name: strictSSL
inputs.label: strictSSL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set the value for sslStrict, turning this to false can help when you want/need to ignore some ssl certificate errors.

inputs.name: retryDelay
inputs.label: Delay between retries (in milliseconds)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Time to delay after a failed call before attempting a retry
